hotelchain

Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • hotelchain.Hotel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hotel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Representation of a hotel. Contains hotel information such as its name and rooms. Implements Serializable so instances can be stored using the FileHandler class.
    Author:
    Joost Janssen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • reserveRoom

        protected Reservation reserveRoom(Guest guest,
                      java.util.Calendar startDate,
                      java.util.Calendar endDate,
                      java.lang.String roomType,
                      int reservationID)
        Reserves a room in this hotel.
        Parameters:
        guest - Guest to book reservation.
        startDate - Arrival date of guest.
        endDate - Departure date of guest.
        roomType - Type of room.
        reservationID - Reservation ID number.
        Returns:
        Returns the resulting Reservation. Returns null if no free room could be found.

      • getFreeRoom

        private int getFreeRoom(java.util.Calendar startDate,
              java.util.Calendar endDate,
              java.lang.String roomType)
        Finds an unreserved room of a specific type in this hotel during a given time frame.
        Parameters:
        startDate - Start date of time frame.
        endDate - End date of time frame.
        roomType - Type of room.
        Returns:
        Returns an available Room during the given time frame, or -1 when none is available.

        Parameters:

        startDate - Start date of interval.
        endDate - End date of interval.
